DOC.brief_summary: The primary purpose of this study is to determine the safest dose of ZD4054 (Zibotentan)in men with prostate cancer
DOC.brief_title: A Phase IIa. Open-label, Multicenter, Dose-escalation Study to Assess the Tolerability and Pharmacokinetics of ZD4054 (Zibotentan) Given Orally Once Daily in Subjects With Metastatic Prostate Cancer
DOC.criteria: Men 18 years & older Confirmed diagnosis of prostate cancer with bone metastases No more than 2 prior chemotherapy regimens No radiation, chemotherapy or bisphosphonates in the past 4 weeks
